test.question: How many red nodes do you see?
How many red nodes do you see?
How many red nodes do you see?
How many green nodes do you see?
How many green nodes do you see?
How many green nodes do you see?

instructions: Please use a desktop or laptop computer, not a tablet or phone, with Google Chrome Browser. Use the pointing device you are most comfortable with (for example, a mouse or touchpad).
Please do not press the back button of the browser and do not refresh the page during the test.
After each question there will be an intermediate page where time will not be measured. If you are forced to stop for some reason, please, take advantage of these moments!
In all questions, you can zoom the image with the mouse wheel and move it by clicking and dragging it.
